ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T14:40:38 [Issue ID 4000-30071] urn:comicvine:4000-30071 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 15:58:47. [Issue ID 44980]
ComicInfo.Summary:
*Contents* Pop Culture forces Video Jack and Damon to fight for the Remote Control through various television realities.
"This Is Your Life & Death" Art by Stephen DeStefano & Dave Hunt. "Space Trek" Art by Michael Gilbert "Sgt. Sitcom" Art by Fred Hembeck & Dave Hunt "Vidzilla" Art by Walter Simonson "Singing Slinger" Art by Jim Starlin & Jose Marzan "The Grape-Crushers" Art by Trina Robbins "What's Up Jack?" Art by Kevin Maguire & Dave Hunt "Jack the Hacker" Art by Bill Wray "Da-mon the Defeated" Art by Keith Giffen & Dave Hunt "Welcome Back Jack" Art by Stephen De Stefano & Dave Hunt Video Jack victorious, uses the Remote Control to return to their home reality. Damon feels remorseful, but with no clear memory of why. Everything in the universe returns to normal, including Doreen Taggert and Mrs. Swift, except Kojak the dog who remains transformed.
Note: Kevin Maguire is credited as "Kevin MacQuire" on the front cover and interior credits.
